title: Interpretation of burying the dead in a dream - seeing burying the dead in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of burying the dead and the graves for the unmarried girl, the married girl, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man if the dead boy is buried again. Burial in a dream is one of the dreams that affects the dreamer in a state of anxiety and extreme confusion because he sees the burial, which is one of the death ceremonies that happen to us as the dead are buried in public life on earth. Because burial or going to cemeteries is one of the things that many people hate, it portends evil, troubles and death in public life and brings us in dreams a large number of different meanings and associations that come to us in the event of seeing it, which we will explain to you in today's interpretations. Interpretation of burying the dead in a dream Whoever dreams of his death and burial travels a lot and does not find money Whoever dreams that he was buried in a grave without dying, then he knows who buried him, then he begins with injustice and oppression or imprisonment. Interpretation of burial in a dream If the dreamer sees that he died and was buried in a dream, this is evidence that he will travel far, but he will not find money. Burial in a grave without death in a dream is evidence of injustice and oppression. Burying a person in the grave without dying in a dream is evidence that he will suffer from injustice in life. Death inside the grave in a dream is evidence that you will suffer from stress in the near future. Entering the grave without death in a dream is evidence of the worry and injustice that the dreamer will suffer from. If the dreamer sees that he is being delivered to the grave, this is evidence that he will be delivered to destruction. Placing the dreamer in the grave in a dream Evidence that he will be harmed in the near future. Putting dirt on the dreamer in a dream is evidence of the money he will soon receive. Whoever is buried in a dream is evidence of corruption of religion in life. Coming out of the grave after burial is evidence that he is a righteous man in life. Seeing the dreamer that he was buried in the dirt in a dream is evidence that his repentance is safe from him. Burying the dreamer after sunrise, noon or sunset in a dream is evidence of imposing evil and prohibiting the right. Burying the dreamer alive in a dream is evidence of cunning and deception. Interpretation of burial ceremonies in a dream Burying the dreamer alive in a dream is evidence of the money he gets. Burying a bachelor in a dream is evidence of marriage in the near future. Burying the dead in a dream is evidence of the great kinship in his life. Seeing the dreamer that he was buried in a dream is evidence of repentance. The dead coming out of the grave after being buried in a dream is evidence of repentance in life. Burying a single woman is evidence of her marriage in the near future. Attending the burial ceremony of a relative in a dream is a sign of kindness and happiness. Watching the burial ceremony in a dream for a relative and the sun was shining is evidence of good health for all Relatives. Attending a relative's funeral and the weather was rainy and dark is evidence of bad news reaching the dreamer. Burial in a sad and painful ritual is evidence of a hostile environment for you or the rapid approach of this environment to you. Interpretation of a dream about burying the dead on YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about witnessing in a dream

preview.html: Contents: The meaning of martyr or honey in the dream of an unmarried, married, pregnant, or divorced girl, whether she ate, ate, or bought from the market, collecting yellow, black, or blond bees, etc., son. Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabul The witness will symbolize in the dream. He dreamed of a legitimate inheritance or money from a company or livelihood because he was not touched by the fire. The witness: an indication of a solemn inheritance or company money. Whoever dreams that there is a witness before him from someone else, then it is high and complete knowledge and people want to listen to him. And if he sees that People feed him. He recites [p. 20] The Qur’an has a beautiful melody that people increase when they hear it. Whoever dreams that he is eating honey and honey on top of it will marry a slave woman. Eating a martyr may indicate that martyrdom was achieved in war, and the same indicates confusion in work. Its exhaustion is evidence of good and pure deeds, and it may indicate sustenance. It is legitimate, plundered, or usurped by people. Perhaps it indicates recovery from diseases, and perhaps testimony indicates the witness that makes it or leads to it. Seeing honey in a dream means that you are living from fatigue. Seeing honey falling from the sky, and this dream indicates victory and grace. In that place. Buying honey in a dream means that you will overcome the financial problems you face in your life. Selling honey in a dream indicates your self-confidence when performing any task. In general, seeing honey in a dream has different interpretations depending on the context of the dream or the dreamer’s condition: If One seeks knowledge, eating honey increases one's knowledge. If he is a merchant, it is a sign of the right decisions he makes. Seeing a martyr in a dream means sustenance that you get without getting tired. A witness in a dream can indicate testimony on God's path or testimony to the truth. Eating marjoram with honey in a dream may indicate marriage. Whoever sees that he is feeding people honeycomb in a dream, this is beautiful and useful talk that people facilitate and accept. Seeing bees in a dream is a symbol of prosperity and good news, and seeing them putting honey in the house means wealth and wealth. Bees in a dream indicate To hard work, hard work, legitimate profits, knowledge and power. Bees in a dream may refer, in general, to the good man of the world and may also indicate longevity. Whoever dreams of extracting honey from bees, this indicates lawful money. To dream of buying bees means wealth. Seeing bees falling On your head in a dream, it means victory, victory, goodness and fertility. Whoever kills a bee in a dream, this indicates getting rid of an enemy, and unless he is a farmer, this means loss of livelihood. Anyone who sees himself stung by a bee in a dream indicates harm or loss to the dreamer’s friend, as well as a bee attack. In a dream. Seeing bees in a dream while they are working means happiness and success. Taking a bee in your hand in a dream, it means good luck. A dead bee in a dream can indicate bad luck. Seeing bees in the middle of the hive in a dream, may indicate tiring financial gains A little honey in a dream Waseem Youssef - YouTube

title: Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin is complete and correct interpretation

preview.html: An encyclopedia is presented to you in the following article: Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the great scholar and pioneer in the science of dream interpretation. He was a follower, born in Basra, and was a skilled imam in hadith, jurisprudence, and interpretation. He mentioned it as one of the interpretations of visions that many Muslims trust because of the intensity of piety, piety, and understanding of the Islamic religion. As for the world of dreams, it cannot be denied how mysterious and strange it is, where a person goes to sleep and finds himself wandering somewhere or meeting people he has not seen for a long time, and it is possible that he Didn't think about them. For several days before bed, where he worked. Visions have a strong relationship with the dreamer’s reality and may convey an important and powerful message that he must take into consideration, and therefore we show you in the following paragraphs the interpretation of the dreamer’s vision of walking in the rain, as mentioned by the Imam. Muhammad Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In the following points, we list the most obvious signs of seeing yourself walking under rainwater in a dream: Rainfall in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness and that sustenance and happiness will be the dreamer’s share in the coming period of his life, by God’s command. The heavy rain falling on the dreamer as he is walking down the road indicates that he will be freed from all the heartache, sadness and delusions that he has suffered from. Walking under the rainwater as the fortuneteller is about to start a business venture is a sign that his venture will achieve great success and he will get a lot from it. Of permissible profits. The dream also shows someone who was burdened with debt and burdened with anxiety that he would pay the debt sooner, thanks to God, and the dreamer’s condition changed from hardship to relief and from distress to relief. Bathing in rainwater for the patient symbolizes the purification of his body from illness, getting rid of it, and a complete and speedy recovery, and God knows best. If the dreamer was walking in the middle of a crowd of people and no one else was raining, then the good news is in his reputation among the gathering and his obtaining a prestigious position or holding an excellent position in the city. His work.Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a single woman. We present in the following paragraph the consequences of an unmarried woman walking under rainwater, as narrated by Ibn Sirin: Rain falling on an unmarried woman in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a desire or God Almighty’s response to an invitation she prayed often, which brings Her joy and happiness. This dream indicates to those who were students and are still in the study stage to excel and obtain the highest grades, and to those who were looking for work, they will get the job they want and which will be good for them, by God’s will. In a dream, an unmarried woman whose marriage is delayed indicates that a good and well-to-do young man is proposing to her, and God will graciously complete their marriage for her and she will live a good and happy life with him. Washing with rain water is an indication of the extent of his virtuous morals, his adherence to the principles of his Islamic religion, and his desire to obey God. Almighty in every word and deed. Walking in heavy rain accompanied by mud or stones, symbolizes the extent of your problems, anxiety, and psychological problems, or that some people are causing them harm. Heavy rain in a dream yum

title: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream: Seeing ants in the house in a dream is a warning sign for the dreamer that he needs to be vigilant to overcome threats and difficulties in life. Seeing ants on clothes indicates that there is some anger over a circumstance that must be overcome. Seeing ants carrying grains indicates However, you will obtain the results of your efforts and efforts. In general, seeing ants in a dream is evidence of fatigue and diligence in working and obtaining profitable results despite difficulties and fatigue. Seeing winged ants is evidence of neglect of work. Seeing ants invading your body indicates a difficult and tiring future. Seeing an army Of ants walking behind you, this dream indicates that you will get a lot of money, profit, wealth, and entering into a fruitful project. Seeing an ant hill in a dream means that you will get a lot of money. And whoever dreams of being stung by ants, this dream does not show kindness and could be A warning sign of a misfortune in the future, especially in the field of work. Whoever sees in a dream that he is trying to kill ants, this is a sign that you are moving away from your goals with your desire. If you see a column of ants in a dream, this means that you are on the right path. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi who dreams With ants in a dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of ants walking on the body of the dreamer. This dream indicates illness or death. And seeing ants coming out of their nest, this dream is evidence of the worry and anxiety that afflicts the dreamer. Seeing many ants leaving the house, this is evidence of death. One of the people of the house, and it may be evidence of the death of many soldiers. Seeing ants may mean goodness prevails among the people of the house if he sees him in a dream carrying food and entering the house. As for ants leaving the house and carrying food, this indicates poverty. And whoever sees ants in a dream coming out From his body, mouth, or nose, this dream indicates the death of the dreamer as a witness. And whoever sees that he is killing ants in a dream, this dream indicates that he committed a sin, and the reason was weak people. Hearing the words of ants in a dream is evidence of the good that will come to the dreamer. And seeing Ants on the bed indicate a large number of children. A dream about an ant hill and its interpretation. Anyone who sees an ant hill collapsing in a dream indicates an incomplete project. And seeing an ant hill near you in a dream, this dream shows your fears about something and your inability to deal with it. And seeing an ant hill Away from you is evidence of your concern about something related to your field of work. Interpretation of seeing ants covering images When you see ants covering their image, this can be a sign and a way to follow your path and reach your goals and it can be an idea to get rid of problems. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations About seeing ants in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we welcome your comments at the bottom of the article on the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of a dream about blood

preview.html: Seeing blood in a dream indicates illegal money. Blood in a dream can indicate lying, and it can also indicate water that has been mixed with impurities. To know more about the meaning of seeing blood in a dream on the authority of Ibn Sirin, follow us in the following lines of this article. Interpretation of the meaning of seeing blood in a dream. Blood in a dream by Ibn SirinWhen a man sees blood in his dream, it means that the dreamer is making profits through illegal means. If a young man sees a blood stain on his clothes, this indicates the presence of a treacherous friend in his life. If one sees that he is drinking his blood, this indicates that the person is in The dream benefits the person in the vision. When a person sees himself spitting blood from his mouth, this indicates a warning to the owner of a great loss. Interpretation of blood in a dream for a single woman: Seeing blood in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news about her engagement. But if she sees her clothes with stains on them Menstrual blood, this is a good dream that portends the removal of worries and sorrows. As for the unmarried woman who sees the blood of the sacrifice, she will soon lose her virginity, either through marriage or rape. As for the unmarried woman who sees red blood coming out of her body in a dream, this indicates her marriage to a person of good character. Seeing white blood coming out of the body of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that the girl has some bad qualities. Seeing blood coming out of the vagina of an unmarried woman, this indicates the death of worries and sadness. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman. But if a married woman sees that she is afflicted By bleeding, this indicates the livelihood and support she will gain. Seeing blood in a married woman’s life is a sign of various changes and may be good news for her in her livelihood. However, if a married woman sees blood bleeding in front of her from another person, this indicates the removal of worry from her life. But if she sees bleeding in a dream, this indicates that this woman is suffering from problems and troubles. If she sees that her hands are bleeding, this indicates that she will lose some things that are important to her. But if a married woman sees that her clothes are dirty with blood, this indicates that there are problems between her and her. Her husband. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina for a married woman. If a married woman sees blood flowing from her vagina, this indicates marital happiness. Seeing blood flowing from her vagina indicates that her husband will get a promotion at work. But if she sees menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman, this indicates a state of affairs. Her good children. Interpretation of seeing blood flowing from a man for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her feet are bleeding, this indicates a major financial crisis. Seeing blood bleeding from a married woman’s husband indicates severe distress and difficulty in livelihood. As for seeing blood flowing from a woman’s husband and her feeling comfortable, this means It indicates that she is free from trouble. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees blood in her dream, this means miscarriage. But if a pregnant woman sees that she is drinking blood in a dream, this indicates that she carries some hatred and resentment from some people. If a pregnant woman sees her own blood while In the ninth month, this indicates ease of childbirth. How much

title: Interpretation of a dream: My husband returned from a trip in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that my husband returned from a trip in a dream. In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream that my husband returned from a trip in a dream, one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are interpretations. Some scholars are diligent, and those in charge of the site do not interfere in interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream that my husband returned from a trip in a dream When you see your husband returning from a trip in a dream, this may indicate some serious problems that he is suffering from at that time and that they are getting rid of them thanks to God. If one sees the husband returning from a trip in a dream, this may indicate the solution of a problem and crisis in those days. When you see the husband returning from the trip in the dream, this may indicate his great provision that he receives by the grace of God in those days. If they see in Dreaming about returning from travel, this may indicate their good skin and happy dreams in those days, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream in detail by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream Corn dreams vary between seeing it, eating it, selling it, or buying it. The following is an explanation of the most important interpretations. Interpretation of seeing corn harvesting Whoever dreams that he is picking corn, this is a beautiful dream and indicates goodness and imminent happiness. As for whoever sees in his dream that others are collecting corn, this is an interpretation that the sleeper is one of the people who rejoice in others. Interpretation of seeing green corn Whoever sees in a dream or dreams that he sees green corn, the green corn here indicates the marriage of any woman or a close husband. As for patience, he stores green corn, which means that the sleeper will achieve what he wants from life. Interpretation of seeing corn in a pregnant woman’s dream If a pregnant woman sees corn, the interpretation of the dream is that she will feel happy, but it will not last and will not be long, God knows best. But if the pregnant woman sees corn planted in the field, the meaning of the dream is that her birth is easy and simple, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a married woman of corn If a married woman sees green corn, she will have a new home, God knows best. Different interpretations of seeing corn in a dream Whoever dreams that he is eating grilled corn, the corn here indicates happiness, but it is not the truth. As for the dreamer, he is walking in the middle of a cultivated field With corn, it usually indicates goodness and abundance of livelihood, God willing. As for if the patient dreams that he is roasting corn in the interpretation of the dream, it is likely that he will recover from his illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing rotten corn in a dream This dream is considered one of the dreams that bring unpleasant and general news and interpretations. If the sleeper dreams that he saw a corrupt person, whether in the field or anywhere else the sleeper saw him, this is his interpretation, and God knows that the sleeper will feel very disappointed. As for those who dream of buying corn, corn here means that the sleeper is going through difficult and harsh financial conditions. Corn has different interpretations for the sleeper, whether he is a man or a married and pregnant woman. The places where you see corn differ, such as eating, peeling, buying, planting or collecting. We have explained to you the most important of them according to the interpretations of interpreters around the world in the field of dreams.

title: Interpretation of seeing a bag of flour in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bag of flour or flour in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Katheer, and Imam Al-Sadiq Married women, pregnant women, men and women. What is the interpretation of seeing a bag of flour in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing flour in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Bring abundance of sustenance and goodness without making any effort and following the path The straight. Seeing selling flour in a dream shows his interest in worldly matters and forgetting the afterlife. Watching rice flour trading is a sign of having a lot of money and bringing a lot of livelihood. See also: Interpretation of seeing flour in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing flour in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: Seeing flour in a dream from Nabulsi is an indication of the coming Abundance of sustenance and blessing for the one who has a vision, rice flour is an indication of ease and facilitation of the fortuneteller’s affairs, and semolina is an indication of high morals and participation in a great important position in a great place. Company. A young man seeing flour in a dream indicates brilliant success in his studies and obtaining great certificates from abroad, and the patient will quickly recover from diseases. See also: Interpretation of seeing cut rice in a dream. Interpretation of seeing palm flour in a dream: Seeing palm flour in a dream is a sign of making an effort. Great for trying to reach the highest positions and have good offspring. Seeing a single girl sifting flour in a dream indicates her happiness in the imminent happy marriage to a pious and virtuous young man. What is the interpretation of seeing flour in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman carrying a large amount of flour is a sign to bring a lot of goodness through His work and trade, or to move it to the near future. Seeing a married woman kneading flour in a dream is a sign of the stability of her married life and the end of all her differences with her husband. Seeing a married woman kneading flour. Bringing baked goods to her family is a sign of good luck and a great source of livelihood. I see in a dream that I am storing flour. On the bright future of the witness of the vision and the goodness that comes to him. See also: Interpretation of seeing unleavened bread, cheese, meat, or thyme pies in a dream. Interpretation of seeing flour in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman of flour in a dream is a sign that she has given birth to a healthy, healthy fetus. Seeing flour in a dream The dream indicates the great joy of her new baby. Seeing flour mixed with water in a dream indicates the ease of her birth and the ease of giving birth and living with a good boy. What is the interpretation of seeing flour in a dream for a man or a young man: Seeing flour in a dream for an unmarried young man is a sign that he has obtained a lot of money without fatigue and effort and that He started large investments and projects. Seeing selling flour in a dream indicates thinking about the world and corruption of morals. Seeing in a dream that I am kneading flour indicates serious religiosity and high morals. Seeing flour fermented and not fermented indicates his lack of livelihood despite great effort, and spoiled flour indicates the loss of all his wealth. A man. Seeing flour in a dream is a sign of good children and abundant sustenance, and kneading it indicates preparing travel papers to secure the future. Seeing barley flour in a dream announces victory over the enemies of success. See also: Interpretation of R

title: Interpretation of the dream book in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a book in a dream means achieving ambitions and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, such as taking a book, and giving. Writers: Buying textbooks from the library, tearing up a new book, gifting the book, and stealing books by Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. More information on this topic: Interpretation of a book in a dream: Seeing a book in a dream indicates that the dreamer is moving in the right direction to achieve his goals, and seeing it in general indicates wisdom and knowledge and may indicate longevity and good health. What if he sees a book obscured in a dream? This means that he is hiding something. Seeing a book burning in the The dream is a good sign for the professional sector, but if you burn a book, the dream indicates a financial crisis. Seeing throwing a book in your dream is a sign of feeling hopeless. An open book in a dream is good and joyful news unlike a closed book. Seeing a book cut in your dream indicates bad news. Seeing yourself eating a book is a warning of impending danger. If you see a book and do not You care about it, it shows arrogance. If you see that you are learning from a book, then this dream indicates happiness and joy. Seeing reading in an old book in a dream expresses curiosity and emotion. Seeing children’s books in a dream refers to nostalgia for the past or childhood. Seeing buying a book in a dream sometimes indicates sorrows, but the vision has many other positive meanings. Seeing yourself buying Books in a dream: This vision indicates that you are a person who enjoys a group of good and strong social relationships with everyone who deals with you. A dream about buying books also indicates that you are one of those people who are good at starting relationships and know how to form good relationships easily. It has been said that seeing yourself buying books In a dream, it means that you will achieve good achievements in your life. As for the vision of buying a book in a dream or picking up the book from a book fair, this vision indicates travel, indicates a business opportunity, and indicates a great partnership that will happen to you. Seeing a dream book for an unmarried girl indicates a relationship Good with a knowledgeable person, an educated person who has a lot of knowledge. If an unmarried girl sees the book open, this means marriage for her. And seeing a large library in a dream. As for a single girl, this indicates that there are many reasons and she must explore the topic of choice, that is, There is more than one person who will propose to her, so she must take into account the reasons for stability, advice, and others. Issues. Seeing a married woman’s dream book also indicates a good relationship, but it indicates a good relationship with her husband and family. Sometimes, seeing a book for a married woman indicates family stability at home. A married woman seeing a closed book indicates a good relationship with her son on In particular, not with all of her children. Seeing a library for a married woman indicates a lot of money. Seeing a book that falls from a hand in a dream is considered obnoxious and indicates the loss of people, which means that this vision could mean a cat.

title: Interpretation of a dream about graduation by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a university graduation in a dream through the content site. Graduating from a university in a dream has many different interpretations and indications. Students make a lot of effort to complete their studies to start a career that suits them to create a bright future or achieve their goals and ambitions that they want to achieve, and the vision of graduating from a dream university differs from one person to another. To a person according to the character and nature of the major, and we will look at some different interpretations and connotations for married, pregnant and unmarried girls. Interpretation of graduation in a dream by Ibn Sirin Researcher Ibn Sirin says that seeing a graduation certificate in a dream can indicate selling or buying a new house, buying land, or buying a car, But if a person sees in his dream that he has obtained a graduation certificate and is a student, he may show his desire to graduate. But if a person sees in his dream that he has obtained a graduation certificate and the dreamer has already finished his studies, this indicates that the major will obtain a new job opportunity that he will get from. During which he holds the highest positions in his work. And when a person sees in his dream that he has obtained a diploma and that the master has completed his studies but without a job, the vision indicates that the master has been exposed to many problems, fears, disagreements and difficulties in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about graduation for single peopleIf a single girl sees in a dream Graduating, this indicates the fulfillment of the desires she wants. Seeing success and graduation in a girl’s dream and she was happy, because this indicates a soon marriage. Seeing a girl who graduated from high school suggests a relationship soon. Seeing a girl in a dream who succeeded in her studies indicates some difficulties and problems that Faced with it. Graduation from studies for unmarried women can indicate happy news such as marriage. Interpretation of a dream about graduation for a married woman. Graduation in a married woman’s dream is evidence of separation and divorce from her husband. If a woman sees that she has graduated from university, this indicates the success of children. Seeing a married woman dreams By graduating more than once, this is a sign that she will achieve her goals and desires. Interpretation of a dream about graduation for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees in a dream, the graduation certificate indicates the possibility of giving birth. Seeing graduation in general and success in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the safety of the newborn and a natural birth. Graduation In a pregnant woman’s dream, it is an indication of the joy and happiness in which you will find yourself. Seeing graduation with distinction in a dream is evidence of the presence of a male child. Interpretation of a dream about graduation for a man: Graduation in a man’s dream is evidence of excellence and achieving goals. If a man sees in a dream that he graduated from a university, this is a sign of A journey to earn money. When a married man sees graduation in a dream, this indicates the marital happiness he lives with his wife. Seeing a good person succeeding and graduating in a dream is evidence of Hajj and Umrah. Graduation and success in a dream is a sign of salvation and difficulty. Seeing that you cannot graduate easily is Evidence that some bad things will happen in the dreamer’s life because they are painful. Graduation certificate in a dream. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a graduation certificate in a dream or and
